page.title: 12THE FARMING YEAR
page.content: This is a summary of the farming year. January moving potatoes and top dressing. Febuary plant corn April plant potatoes.Chemicals sprayed on fields to stop pests. May spray top dressing. Use a computer to tell them when to spray and when to start top dressing. June hay making. July havest winter barley and rape. Spray rape to seal the pods so the seed does not come out. August harvest spring barley and potatoes. September winter barley harvested and straw bailed. October spray new rape. November plough rape before Christmas. December ploughing.
